text: (nabiye!) obage deviyan malayikavarunta “ma bhumiyehi (mage) niyojitaya (adam)va nirmanaya kirimata yannemi” yayi pævasu avasthavedi, (eyata) ovun “(bhumiyehi) napurukam karamin le vaguravannata (paramparavak bihi kirimata) yana ohuva, ehi (obage niyojitaya vasayen) pat karannehida? api nam, obage parisuddhabhavaya pavasamin, obage prasamsava magin obava suvisuddha karaminma sitinnemu” yayi pævasuha. (eyata deviyan vahanse) “oba nodænuvat dæya siyalla niyata vasayenma ma hondin dæna sitinnemi” yayi pævasuveya
